description.zh-cn: 中国近代京剧表演艺术家，京剧“四大名旦”之首，梅派艺术创始人。
description.en: A modern Chinese Peking Opera performance artist, head of the 'Four Great Dan Roles', and founder of the Mei School.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳的元配妻子。
description.en: Mei Lanfang's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳的平妻，旦角演员。
description.en: Mei Lanfang's second wife (pingqi), a Dan role actress.

description.zh-cn: 京剧名老生，曾与梅兰芳有过一段未获承认的婚姻关系。
description.en: A famous Peking Opera Laosheng actress who had an unrecognized marital relationship with Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳的父亲。
description.en: Mei Lanfang's father.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳的母亲。
description.en: Mei Lanfang's mother.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳的祖父，北京著名青衣花旦演员。
description.en: Mei Lanfang's grandfather, a famous Qingyi and Huadan actor in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳与福芝芳之子。
description.en: Son of Mei Lanfang and Fu Zhifang.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳与福芝芳之子。
description.en: Son of Mei Lanfang and Fu Zhifang.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳与福芝芳之女，梅派京剧艺术传人，主攻老生。
description.en: Daughter of Mei Lanfang and Fu Zhifang, an inheritor of the Mei School art, specializing in Laosheng roles.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳与福芝芳之子，梅派京剧旦角艺术传人。
description.en: Son of Mei Lanfang and Fu Zhifang, an inheritor of the Mei School's Dan role art.

description.zh-cn: “同光十三绝”之一的青衣演员，梅兰芳的启蒙老师。
description.en: A Qingyi actor, one of the 'Thirteen Greats of the Tongzhi-Guangxu Era', and Mei Lanfang's first teacher.

description.zh-cn: “喜连成班”班主，收梅兰芳为徒。
description.en: Head of the 'Xiliancheng Ban' troupe, who took Mei Lanfang as his apprentice.

description.zh-cn: 戏剧理论家，梅兰芳的良师益友，将齐白石介绍给梅兰芳。
description.en: A drama theorist, a good teacher and helpful friend to Mei Lanfang, who introduced Qi Baishi to him.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名画家，曾教授梅兰芳画画。
description.en: A famous Chinese painter who taught Mei Lanfang painting.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人，对梅兰芳表示赏识。
description.en: The main leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who expressed appreciation for Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 京剧“四大名旦”之一，梅兰芳的学生。
description.en: One of the 'Four Great Dan Roles' in Peking Opera and a student of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初的著名京剧科班。
description.en: A famous Peking Opera school and troupe in the late Qing dynasty and early Republic of China.

en: Four Great Dan of Peking Opera

description.zh-cn: 对20世纪20年代中国京剧四位著名旦角演员的合称，梅兰芳为领衔人。
description.en: A collective title for four famous Dan role actors in Chinese Peking Opera of the 1920s, led by Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间汪精卫为响应近卫声明而成立的政权，曾力邀梅兰芳演出但遭拒绝。
description.en: A regime established by Wang Jingwei during the Second Sino-Japanese War in response to the Konoe Statement, which invited Mei Lanfang to perform but was refused.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一届全国人民代表大会。
description.en: The first session of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的文理学院，曾授予梅兰芳文学荣誉博士学位。
description.en: A liberal arts college in the United States that awarded Mei Lanfang an honorary Doctor of Letters degree.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的大学，曾授予梅兰芳文学荣誉博士学位。
description.en: A university in the United States that awarded Mei Lanfang an honorary Doctor of Letters degree.

description.zh-cn: 1923年发生在日本关东地区的大地震，梅兰芳曾为此赴日进行赈灾义演。
description.en: A major earthquake in Japan's Kantō region in 1923, for which Mei Lanfang traveled to Japan for a benefit performance.

description.zh-cn: 标志着第二次世界大战结束的事件，之后梅兰芳重返舞台。
description.en: The event that marked the end of World War II, after which Mei Lanfang returned to the stage.

description.zh-cn: 王明华为梅兰芳的元配妻子。
description.en: Wang Minghua was Mei Lanfang's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 福芝芳为梅兰芳的平妻。
description.en: Fu Zhifang was Mei Lanfang's second wife (pingqi).

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳与孟小冬有过一段未获家族承认的婚姻关系，后分手。
description.en: Mei Lanfang had a marital relationship with Meng Xiaodong that was not recognized by his family; they later separated.

description.zh-cn: 梅巧玲是梅兰芳的祖父。
description.en: Mei Qiaoling was Mei Lanfang's grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳八岁起师从吴菱仙学戏。
description.en: Mei Lanfang began studying opera under Wu Lingxian at the age of eight.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳被“喜连成班”班主叶春善收为徒弟。
description.en: Mei Lanfang was taken as an apprentice by Ye Chunshan, the head of the 'Xiliancheng Ban' troupe.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳拜师齐白石学画工虫。
description.en: Mei Lanfang became a student of Qi Baishi to learn how to paint insects.

description.zh-cn: 程砚秋是梅兰芳的门下弟子。
description.en: Cheng Yanqiu was a disciple of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 梅葆玖继承了其父梅兰芳的旦角艺术。
description.en: Mei Baojiu inherited the Dan role art of his father, Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳搭“喜连成班”演出。
description.en: Mei Lanfang performed with the 'Xiliancheng Ban' troupe.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳是“四大名旦”之首。
description.en: Mei Lanfang was the leader of the 'Four Great Dan Roles'.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，梅兰芳当选第一届全国人大代表。
description.en: In 1954, Mei Lanfang was elected as a representative to the First National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 1959年，梅兰芳加入中国共产党。
description.en: In 1959, Mei Lanfang joined the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳得到中共领导人毛泽东赏识，毛泽东甚至称呼他为“梅老板”。
description.en: Mei Lanfang was appreciated by the CCP leader Mao Zedong, who even called him 'Boss Mei'.

description.zh-cn: 齐如山是梅兰芳的良师益友。
description.en: Qi Rushan was a good teacher and helpful friend to Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 1920年，齐如山介绍齐白石和梅兰芳相识。
description.en: In 1920, Qi Rushan introduced Qi Baishi and Mei Lanfang to each other.

description.zh-cn: 齐白石与梅兰芳建立了师友之谊。
description.en: Qi Baishi and Mei Lanfang established a friendship of teacher and student.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳拒绝为汪精卫国民政府演出，并蓄须明志。
description.en: Mei Lanfang refused to perform for the Wang Jingwei regime and grew a beard to show his determination.

description.zh-cn: 1924年，为给关东大地震赈灾，梅兰芳受邀赴日进行义演。
description.en: In 1924, Mei Lanfang was invited to Japan for a benefit performance to provide relief for the Great Kantō earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 1930年访美期间，波莫纳学院授予梅兰芳文学荣誉博士学位。
description.en: During his visit to the US in 1930, Pomona College awarded Mei Lanfang an honorary Doctor of Letters degree.

description.zh-cn: 1930年访美期间，南加州大学授予梅兰芳文学荣誉博士学位。
description.en: During his visit to the US in 1930, the University of Southern California awarded Mei Lanfang an honorary Doctor of Letters degree.

description.zh-cn: 1945年日本投降后，梅兰芳于10月重出舞台。
description.en: After the surrender of Japan in 1945, Mei Lanfang returned to the stage in October.
